thread.title: Dick Vitale’s call of Syracuse’s buzzer-beater win over Duke will get you ready for March | For The Win
thread.title_full: Dick Vitale’s call of Syracuse’s buzzer-beater win over Duke will get you ready for March | For The Win

author: Andrew Joseph
title: Dick Vitale’s call of Syracuse’s buzzer-beater win over Duke will get you ready for March | For The Win
text:
Dick Vitale’s call of Syracuse’s buzzer-beater win over Duke will get you ready for March Dick Vitale’s call of Syracuse’s buzzer-beater win over Duke will get you ready for March By Andrew Joseph February 22, 2017 9:45 pm Follow @andyj0seph 382 shares Follow @andyj0seph 
Syracuse pulled off a stunning win over No. 11 Duke on Wednesday after John Gillon banked in a 3-pointer as time expired. 
The game-winning bucket sent the Carrier Dome into a frenzy — even leading to a court storming. But best of all, ESPN’s Dick Vitale was on the call. If you’re not ready for March Madness yet, this call from Vitale will certainly get you there. John Gillon wins it at the buzzer for Cuse! #DUKEvsCUSE pic.twitter.com/MEW1SrkB3a 
— Brian Rauf (@brauf33) February 23, 2017 
Just one more week. We missed you, March. 
Gillon finished the game with 26 points. More NCAAB!
